name: The 12th Int’l Psychology and Health Conference
content: The 12th Int’l Psychology and Health Conference (PHC 2024) will be held during May 31- June 2, 2024, in Kunming, China. This Conference will cover issues on Clinical Psychology, Cognitive Behavioral Therapy, Behavioral Psychology,Humanistic Psychology, Child and Adolescent Psychology. It dedicates to creating a stage for exchanging the latest research results and sharing the advanced research methods.
